com.adidas.ui.activities

Class AdidasActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.adidas.ui.activities.AdidasActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnTouchListenerRegistrySupport
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdidasSearchActivity, AdidasWebViewActivity, TakeAndCropImageActivity

    public class AdidasActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
implements OnTouchListenerRegistrySupport
    Activity created to be used as base activity class. This class changes the action bar font to adihaus font, sets notifications count, sets custom actionbar layout and etc.

      • setActionBarNotificationCount

        public void setActionBarNotificationCount(int notificationCount)
        Using this method will show and update the notification count in the action bar if this is visible. If the count is 0 or below, the nofiication count will be hidden.
        Parameters:
        notificationCount - The amount of notifications to show in the ticker.

      • hideActionBarNotificationCount

        public void hideActionBarNotificationCount()
        This method will hide the notification count displayed in the action bar in the case that it is currently showing
